QuestData.Title: The Battle for Andorhal
QuestData.Description: I just got word, $g lad: lass;. It doesn't sound good.$b$bThe city of Andorhal is in the middle of a three-way war between the Forsaken, the Alliance, and the Scourge. King Wrynn has rolled the dice and sent a death knight to lead the charge for his cause, but I'm sure he can use all the help he can get.$b$bI hate to see you go, but they've asked for you by name, $n. Speak with Guthrum Thunderfist outside. He'll put you on the first gryphon out to Andorhal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Guthrum Thunderfist to fly to Andorhal in Western Plaguelands. Then report to Thassarian within Andorhal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Thassarian within Andorhal in Western Plaguelands.
